success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant created a return (RMA) for the order placed on 2025-10-21 via create_return.

task.objective: Return an order that was delivered.

persona.name: Dr. Rachel Kim
persona.bio: Rachel Kim works for the Maryland Department of Health tracking infectious disease outbreaks and analyzing public health data. She monitors flu trends, investigates foodborne illness clusters, and writes reports for health officials. Her days involve lots of data analysis, stakeholder calls, and the occasional field investigation.
sample_messages: Setting up county health director briefing for next Tuesday 2pm. Need confirmation from all 5 directors + send them the data packet
CDC EIS conference April 12-15. Book flight + hotel, need to arrive evening of the 11th
Grant approved! Ordering 4 laptops for the epi team - specs in the shared doc. Processing timeline?

messages.output_raw: Need to return an order that was delivered.

steps.output_raw:
<think>
</think>
<plan>
1. Ask the user for details to locate the order (order id or identity info).
2. Look up the order using find_orders and/or get_order_details.
3. Check what items are returnable using get_return_options.
4. Confirm which items, quantities, and return method the user wants.
5. Create the return with create_return and share instructions and refund estimate.
</plan>
<action type="say">
I can help with that.

To get started, I need to locate your order and see what’s eligible to return.

Please provide one of the following:
- Your order ID, or
- The email used on the order + shipping ZIP code, or
- The email used on the order + last 4 digits of the card you paid with

Also, let me know:
- Which item(s) from the order you want to return
- How many of each
- Why you’re returning them (e.g., didn’t fit, damaged, changed mind)
- Whether you prefer dropping off a package or scheduling a pickup (if both are available)</action>

action_structured.text:
I can help with that.

To get started, I need to locate your order and see what’s eligible to return.

Please provide one of the following:
- Your order ID, or
- The email used on the order + shipping ZIP code, or
- The email used on the order + last 4 digits of the card you paid with

Also, let me know:
- Which item(s) from the order you want to return
- How many of each
- Why you’re returning them (e.g., didn’t fit, damaged, changed mind)
- Whether you prefer dropping off a package or scheduling a pickup (if both are available)

item: art supplies set from that order

<action type="say">
I found your order and see these items:

1) Watercolor Paint Set – $34.99 (returnable)  
2) Paint Brushes - Assorted – $24.99 (returnable)  
3) Custom Engraved Palette - Final Sale – $27.99 (not returnable)

When you say “art supplies set,” do you want to return:
- Just the Watercolor Paint Set,
- Just the Paint Brushes, or
- Both the Watercolor Paint Set and the Paint Brushes?

Also, can you confirm:
- Your full name for the return label
- A contact phone number (in case the carrier needs it)

You already said drop-off is fine and your ZIP is 21201, so after you confirm which item(s), I’ll set up the return using drop-off and show you the refund amount and label/QR details.</action>

observation.raw:
{
  "success": true,
  "rma_id": "RMA-584203",
  "label_url": "https://returns.example.com/labels/RMA-584203.pdf",
  "qr_code_token": "QR-RET-9f72c4b1d6",
  "instructions": "Print the prepaid label and attach it securely over any previous labels, or present the QR code at a participating USPS dropoff location. Include all original packaging. Drop off within 30 days of delivery to remain eligible for a full refund.",
  "pickup_confirmation": null,
  "refund_estimate": {
    "currency": "USD",
    "amount": 59.98,
    "method": "original",
    "timeline_estimate": "3–7 business days after the items are scanned by the carrier."
  },
  "message": "Your return for 2 item(s) has been created. Use the provided label or QR code at any USPS dropoff location, such as USPS Store - Baltimore Downtown, 123 E Baltimore St, Baltimore, MD 21201."
}

parsed.instructions: Print the prepaid label and attach it securely over any previous labels, or present the QR code at a participating USPS dropoff location. Include all original packaging. Drop off within 30 days of delivery to remain eligible for a full refund.

refund_estimate.timeline_estimate: 3–7 business days after the items are scanned by the carrier.

parsed.message: Your return for 2 item(s) has been created. Use the provided label or QR code at any USPS dropoff location, such as USPS Store - Baltimore Downtown, 123 E Baltimore St, Baltimore, MD 21201.

steps.output_raw:
<think>
We’ve successfully created the return with all needed details from the tool. Now I should summarize the RMA ID, items, refund estimate, label/QR usage, and timing, keeping it concise and clear so the user knows exactly what to do next. No more tools are needed unless they later ask to track the return.
</think>
<plan>
1. Confirm to the user that the return has been created and summarize key details (RMA, refund estimate, label/QR, deadline, steps).
</plan>
<action type="say">
You’re all set—your return is created.

Here are the details:
- Items: Watercolor Paint Set (1), Paint Brushes - Assorted (1)  
- Return ID (RMA): RMA-584203  
- Estimated refund: $59.98 USD to your original payment method  
- Refund timing: Typically 3–7 business days after USPS scans the return

How to return:
1) Label/QR:
   - Print label: https://returns.example.com/labels/RMA-584203.pdf  
   - Or use QR code token: QR-RET-9f72c4b1d6 at a participating USPS dropoff.

2) Packing:
   - Put both items in one package with any original packaging.
   - Attach the prepaid label securely over any old labels, or just bring the unlabelled package and show the QR code at USPS.

3) Deadline:
   - Drop off within 30 days of delivery to keep full refund eligibility.

If you’d like, I can help you pick the closest USPS dropoff location to you in 21201, or we can check the status of this return later using your RMA ID.</action>

action_structured.text:
You’re all set—your return is created.

Here are the details:
- Items: Watercolor Paint Set (1), Paint Brushes - Assorted (1)  
- Return ID (RMA): RMA-584203  
- Estimated refund: $59.98 USD to your original payment method  
- Refund timing: Typically 3–7 business days after USPS scans the return

How to return:
1) Label/QR:
   - Print label: https://returns.example.com/labels/RMA-584203.pdf  
   - Or use QR code token: QR-RET-9f72c4b1d6 at a participating USPS dropoff.

2) Packing:
   - Put both items in one package with any original packaging.
   - Attach the prepaid label securely over any old labels, or just bring the unlabelled package and show the QR code at USPS.

3) Deadline:
   - Drop off within 30 days of delivery to keep full refund eligibility.

If you’d like, I can help you pick the closest USPS dropoff location to you in 21201, or we can check the status of this return later using your RMA ID.
